Title: Welcome to the Google+ - Optimizer wizard
Description:
This wizard helps you configure the features, widgets and filters. Click onto "next" to start the wizard.

Note: You always can restart this wizard in the settings.

Title: Welcome to the Google+ Optimizer
+1 Filter
Description: This filter removes all "John Doe +1'd this following post".

Title: YouTube Filter
Description: This filter removes all youtube comments from your stream.

Title: Community Invites
Description: Google+ offers you communitis which might be of interest for you. If you don't want that, this filter removes suggestions and invites

Title: Birthdays
Description: If a person in your circles celebrates his birthday, you get the chance to congratulate him just like all the other 25.452 contacts here on Google+. You don't want that?? Enable this feature.

Title: You may know
Description: Google+ tries to analyze who you might like. Sometimes this works, sometimes not. If you don't want that activate this filter

Title: Trending
Description: Who cares what's trending? Don't be a sheep!

Title: Featured Collections
Description: If you don't care for these collections, enable this filter.

Title: Custom-Filter
Description: Filter ANY text in any post. This filter isn't case-sensitive.

Title: Hashtag-Filter
Description:
Filter any post that contains a specific hashtag.
(You can enter with or without the "#")

Title: Wham-Filter
Minimize pictures
Mimimize videos
Minimize Urls
Stoppwatch
Description: Never burn your pizza again!

Title: Highlight posts
Description: You will get additional features on your contacts' pages. You can hightlight them by color or add additional information. Feel free to enter "dumbass" if you want. Noone else but you can see it.

Title: Display trophies
Description:
Trophies are achievements you can earn by some actions in Google+. You cannot win a real price but you can brag with them... :)

The trophies are displayed in your profile. .

Title: Display Emoticons
Description: Google+ suddenly just looks like you favourite chat-app

Title: LSR
Description: Display LSR-Notes.

Title: Autosave
Description: Saves your posts even if you don't (or your browser crashes).

Title: Bookmarks (Favourites)
Description: You can save interesting posts and review them later on

Title: Languages
Description: Display Google+ in a different language. (This includes local results for "what's hot"

Title: Bugs
Description:
Watch and add bug reports


Existing tickets:

Title: Feature requests
Description:
Watch and enter feature requests


Existing ticketsTickets:

Title: Add ticket
Description:
Report bug or ask for a feature.
Create ticket

Title: Wizard
Description: The wizard offers an easy way to configure new features.Restart him or disable him here..

Title: Licenses and sources
Save and load configuration
There are even more new features
Description: But these are to complex to setup them in this wizard. Use the setup to configure them. Those features are: _EVENMORESTUFF_

Title: Configuration finished
Description: All settings have been saved. This wizard will disappear until new features are available. You can change this behaviour in the settings.
